summary: This document contains various financial records and account opening procedures related to LSJ Employees LLC, a company associated with Jeffrey Epstein. It includes customer due diligence forms, account agreements, and certifications of beneficial ownership, detailing the company's structure, ownership, and banking relationships.

keyFacts: LSJ Employees LLC was formed on October 27, 2011, with Jeffrey Epstein as the Sole Member.
The company is registered in the U.S. Virgin Islands and has no intention of conducting business beyond employing household employees.
Jeanne Brennan serves as the Manager of LSJ Employees LLC, while Darren Indyke is the attorney for the company.
The company has a bank account with FirstBank for corporate expenses.
The company has been described as a holding company with no active business operations.
